body_html: Ah I see what you mean now. Yeah that is a bit annoying, but having longer lines or introducing an extra parenthesis isn't the end of the world. I'm obviously biased, but I think chaining is a neat way to approach this. Sure was an improvement on my first API for nninit.
body_text: Ah I see what you mean now. Yeah that is a bit annoying, but having longer lines or introducing an extra parenthesis isn't the end of the world. I'm obviously biased, but I think chaining is a neat way to approach this. Sure was an improvement on my first API for nninit.
body: Ah I see what you mean now. Yeah that is a bit annoying, but having longer lines or introducing an extra parenthesis isn't the end of the world. I'm obviously biased, but I think chaining is a neat way to approach this. Sure was an improvement on [my first API for `nninit`](https://github.com/Kaixhin/nninit/tree/ac110397f4ac6827413c60a9c02da9af7143bc19#example).
